content.rendered:
Mobility

Mobility

We are Revolutionizing the world of Mobility

Providing better solutions for overcoming the challenges of the technology curve, competition and increasing customer expectations.

Capitalizing on the prowess of electronics to upgrade various systems used in vehicles to communicate, monitor, control, navigate and entertain.

Offerings

CONNECTIVITY SOLUTIONS Connected to the internet, vehicles communicate with the physical environment and other vehicles around them. Here comes the need of Infotainment – the combination of information and entertainment, and Telematics – the combination of telecommunication and informatics.

With its competencies in infotainment and embedded skills, we add value to next generation state-of-art Vehicle Infotainment and Telematics. EV SOLUTIONS NeST Digital provides Electric Vehicle (EV) Charging Solutions, including EV Quick chargers and On-board chargers, with a unique design architecture tailored for the US/EU/China/Indian markets.

Our solutions comply with industry standards from IEC, SAE, and NEC, and provide an effective way to meet the increasing power needs of electronic devices in the EV mobility segment. VEHICLE CONTROL NeST Digital provides a range of vehicle Electronic Control Units (ECUs) and specializes in tailored ECU development, including OBD dongles, control modules for rental vehicles, & add-on communication modules.

Our development methodology uses both AUTOSAR and non-AUTOSAR frameworks, depending on project requirements. We also offer design & development solutions aligned with functional safety & cybersecurity requirements for each product. E-COCKPIT Offering infotainment head unit features like Media Player, AM/FM Tuner, BT-Audio,Navigation,Smartphone Integration,HVAC Control and Dynamic Theme change.

We also offer digital instrument cluster features like fully digital cluster with 3D artwork, Turn by Turn Navigation, Media information, Rear Camera view, Dynamic Theme change and Steering wheel control. AUTONOMOUS & ADAS NeST Digital has expertise in Autonomous and Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS) solutions, utilizing Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Image processing technologies.

They specialize in areas such as Deep learning, Feature Space Engineering, Neural network design, Natural Language processing, and Image recognition using MATLAB and TensorFlow, to make complex decisions based on different sensor data in autonomous vehicles.

Platforms & Solutions

Vehicle Electronics

Providing better solutions for overcoming the challenges of the technology curve, competition and increasing customer expectations.

Capitalizing on the prowess of electronics to upgrade various systems used in vehicles to communicate, monitor, control, navigate and entertain.

EV Charging

We offer end to end EV charging solutions which involves plant modelling, HW architecture, SW architecture, Systems Engineering, Specification Development, Control systems, algorithm and model development, diagnostics and validation.

Success Stories

Porting to the New Generation Steering Column Control Module

System Basis Chip (SBC) upgrade of steering column control Module (SCCM)

Platform Support for Next-Gen Body control ECMs
